Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

Inventory_Adjustment_Data.description: Reference to an existing Inventory Site.  Assigns the Site for the transaction and derives the Company.

validation.validation: The Stocking Location must belong to the Inventory Site specified in the header.
validation.description: The Stocking Location must belong to the Inventory Site specified in the header.

validation.validation: Location [loc] is currently on hold.

Inventory_Adjustment_Detail_Data.description: Reference to the Item Lot ID

validation.validation: A lot id can't be assigned to an item which is not lot-controlled.
The Lot ID is required for lot-controlled items.

Inventory_Adjustment_Detail_Data.description: References the quantity to be adjusted (positive value for increase, negative value for decrease).

validation.validation: The Quantity must be a whole number for the UOM.
The Quantity must convert into a valid whole number in Base UOM.
Invalid storage location referenced for [purchase item] [uom] [lot] [supplier] in location [location].  Either a put away has not yet occurred or the entered data is invalid.

The quantity entered can’t be adjusted. The adjustment quantity ([qty to adjust] [base uom]) is greater than the quantity available to reserve ([adjustable qty] [base uom]). Unreserve [difference] [base uom] to allow this adjustment.
Invalid storage location referenced for [purchase item] [uom] [lot] in location [location].  Either a put away has not yet occurred or the entered data is invalid.

The Quantity to Adjust (decrease) is greater than the quantity available to be adjusted. Please correct the Quantity to Adjust so the resulting quantity on hand is greater than or equal to the quantity which is currently picked/allocated in the location.
validation.description: The Quantity to Adjust (decrease) is greater than the quantity available to be adjusted. Please correct the Quantity to Adjust so the resulting quantity on hand is greater than or equal to the quantity which is currently picked/allocated in the location.

Inventory_Adjustment_Detail_Data.description: References the Item Serials for the Inventory Item

validation.validation: The serial number(s) [numbers] do not belong to the item [item].
The count of serial numbers entered does not match the quantity.
Serial number(s) [numbers] are on open return orders.
This set of serial number(s) ([itemserials]) is not located at [location] [lot] for [item]. Please check the serial number(s) on [item].
This set of serial number(s) ([itemserials]) is not located at [location] [lot] for [item]. Please check the serial number(s) on [item].
Select a different serial number. <[number]> is already in use in another location.
Serial number(s) [number] currently exists on another picking list.
Please select a serial number that is not already in use.These serial numbers are already used in Quick Issue:[Serials]

validation.validation: Invalid Adjustment Reason - Adjustment Type must be 'Increase' for positive adjustment and 'Decrease' for negative adjustment.

Inventory_Adjustment_Detail_Data.description: Memo for the Inventory Adjustment detail line.

Inventory_Adjustment_Data.description: Encapsulating element containing Inventory Adjustment detail data.

validation.validation: Duplicate serial numbers are not allowed.
Supplier is required when adjustment is done in a consigned location.
validation.description: Supplier is required when adjustment is done in a consigned location.

validation.validation: Multiple adjustment rows found for [location] [item] [uom] [lot]. Please remove the duplicate row(s).
